::: {.callout-note}
The following study was performed by __Daniel Vartanian (DV)__ and Camilo Rodrigues Neto (CR).

__DV__ contributed to the design, implementation of the software. __CR__ contributed as a science adviser and reviewer. __DV__ wrote the manuscript. All authors discussed the results and revised the final manuscript.

(_Future reference_): Vartanian, D, & Rodrigues Neto, C. (2024). {entrainment}: A rule-based model of the 24h light/dark cycle entrainment phenomenon. _Journal of Statistical Software_.
